9647.<voice 00330_00009647><center>エテーネの民の姿を取:
You have regained your form as one of Ethene. With the help of the Ark of the Earth, you can now travel to
the past.

9648.<voice 00360_00009648><center>ただし 行けるのは:
<voice 00360_00009648><center>However, you can only go in
your human form, as the blood of
Ethene flows within you.

9649.<voice 00390_00009649><center>さあ お行きなさい。:
Now go, <pc> of Ethene.
Fulfill the mission that has been
bestowed upon you...

19001157.<pc>は\n仲間たちと 一時的に別れた！:
<pc> temporarily parted ways
with their companions!

47778.<voice 00760_00047778><start_lip_sync n0:
I have been waiting for you,
<pc> of Ethene.
I am Zebes, the Conductor of Time.

47779.<voice 00840_00047779><start_lip_sync n0:
Whenever you wish to return to your
time, please do not hesitate to
ask me.

47780.<voice 00930_00047780><start_lip_sync n0:
Please take care, and have a
safe journey.

19001158.<pc>は\n仲間たちと 一時的に別れた！:
<pc> temporarily parted ways
with their companions!

41420.<voice 00040_00041420><start_lip_sync n0:
It's coming! Everyone!
Get inside, now!!

9651.<voice 01150_00009651><start_lip_sync n0:
Don't just stand there!!
Get over here, quickly!

9652.<voice 01953_00009652><start_lip_sync n0:
Looks like you didn't get burned.
Thank goodness...

9653.<voice 02044_00009653><start_lip_sync n0:
You... seem like you're new to these
parts. I guess you haven't heard
about Reidametes, then.

9654.<voice 02165_00009654><start_lip_sync n0:
Reidametes... the false sun that consumes everything down below... whenever it appears, we can't let
its light touch us!

9655.<voice 02257_00009655><start_lip_sync n0:
It's already been a year since it first
appeared... and now this place, Glen
Castle, is the last place we can hide...

19001159.<voice 02500_19001159><start_lip_sync n0:
It's gone... O Goddess...
Thank you for the gift of life today.

9658.<voice 00075_00009658><start_lip_sync n0:
This is Erju's room.
He just left to go and see Theodore.

9659.<voice 00160_00009659><start_lip_sync n0:
But you must leave now. If I let a stranger into his room without permission, the young master will
definitely scold me.

9660.<voice 00210_00009660><start_lip_sync n0: Oh, so you're the new refugee?

9661.<voice 00450_00009661><start_lip_sync n0:
I see. So you're called <pc>?
My name is Theodore. My duty is to
lead the people of Glen Castle.

9662.<voice 00541_00009662><start_lip_sync n0:
The journey here must've been
quite arduous. I'm glad you were
able to make it here safely.

9663.<voice 00635_00009663><start_lip_sync n0:
As most of the world has been consumed by flame, this castle is our last hope. As humans, we must
all help one another.

9664.<voice 00805_00009664><start_lip_sync n0:
However, rest assured that the world
will not end. That is the reason
we have all gathered here.

9665.<voice 00975_00009665><start_lip_sync n0:
Our mages have joined together to erect a barrier of light to protect the castle. And... Is there something you
need to ask me?

9666.<voice 01175_00009666><start_lip_sync n0:
What? You're looking for a mage
who can sail the Sacred Ship?

9668.<voice 01746_00009668><start_lip_sync n0:
My apologies, <pc>.
I meant no offense.

9669.<voice 01938_00009669><start_lip_sync n0:
Bernhardt, who was a Ship Shaper, has unfortunately died. He sailed alone into Reidametes and was
consumed by the flames.

9670.<voice 02023_00009670><start_lip_sync n0:
A fitting end for a fool who
couldn't listen...

9672.<voice 02418_00009672><start_lip_sync n0:
Erju. We have a guest.
Mind your manners.

9673.<voice 02513_00009673><start_lip_sync n0:
This light barrier is a waste of time!
If we don't stop Reidametes directly,
then we're all done for!

9674.<voice 02663_00009674><start_lip_sync n0:
So, I will inherit the ability to
sail the Sacred Ship...

9675.<voice 02754_00009675><start_lip_sync n0:
And then...
Reidametes will be destroyed for good.

9677.<voice 03008_00009677><start_lip_sync n0:
You're too much like your father,
Bernhardt! Are you just as eager to die?!

9678.<voice 03107_00009678><start_lip_sync n0:
Shut up!
Don't you dare mock my father's death!

9679.<voice 03312_00009679><start_lip_sync n0:
Then by all means... do as you like.
No one will care if the Sacred
Ship bloodline finally dies off.

9680.<voice 03592_00009680><start_lip_sync n0:
That is the son of the dead Ship
Shaper I mentioned. He's still
young and ignorant.

9681.<voice 03662_00009681><start_lip_sync n0:
If you are looking for a Ship Shaper,
Erju cannot help you. He has not
yet inherited the ability to sail it.

9682.<voice 03807_00009682><start_lip_sync n0:
There exists Four Sorcerers in this
world, each knowing a different art.
The Ship Shaper is one of those arts.

9683.<voice 03842_00009683><start_lip_sync n0:
The Four Sorcerers have sworn an oath that each of their arts must be passed on to one of a righteous heart.
That succession requires a ritual by the remaining three sorcerers.

9684.<voice 03882_00009684><start_lip_sync n0:
Erju plans on going to the other three sorcerers for the succession, but there is no way they'd accept a novice
such as him.

9685.<voice 04057_00009685><start_lip_sync n0:
If you're worried about him, you
can go see him in his room on the first
floor.

10142.<voice 00132_00010142><start_lip_sync n0:
Young master! You can't go alone!
I beg you, please calm down!

10143.<voice 00475_00010143><start_lip_sync n0:
You were with Theodore just now,
weren't you?
Do you need something from me?<yesno><close>

10144.<voice 00552_00010144><start_lip_sync n0:
If you don't, then why would you just
barge into someone's room for no
reason? I don't have time for this!

10145.<voice 00676_00010145><start_lip_sync n0:
Huh? What? You came from 500 years
in the future to make sure the art of
the Ship Shaper is properly passed down?

10146.<voice 00828_00010146><start_lip_sync n0:
Oh, I get it... So you came here to
make a fool out of me, too, huh?

10147.<voice 01235_00010147><start_lip_sync n0:
I wasn't going to let the art of the
Sacred Ship die out whether you
said so or not.

10148.<voice 01555_00010148><start_lip_sync n0:
Passing on the art is a cinch.
Just wait here, and the new Ship
Shaper will save the day.

10151.<voice 02183_00010151><start_lip_sync n0:
Oh... you! You came here out of
concern for the young master, right?
Will you help him?!

10152.<voice 02298_00010152><start_lip_sync n0:
Oh, sorry for being so hasty...
I should have said so sooner, but I'm Kai.
I used to work for Master Bernhardt.

10153.<voice 02425_00010153><start_lip_sync n0:
Let me tell you what happened.
About two months ago, Master
Bernhardt set out to destroy Reidametes...

10155.<voice 03097_00010155><start_lip_sync n0:
Don't worry. I'll be back. Please take
care of Erju for me until then.

10158.<voice 03516_00010158><start_lip_sync n0:
Someone has to fight... and I
have the power to do so with the
Sacred Ship.

10160.<voice 03585_00010160><start_lip_sync n0:
Please watch me... and when this is
all over, everyone can finally go
back to Lendersia.

10161.<voice 04214_00010161><start_lip_sync n0:
I will destroy Reidametes and
bring peace to this world!

10162.<voice 04299_00010162><start_lip_sync n0:
I promise to you all that I will
stop this madness once and for all!

10163.<voice 05056_00010163><start_lip_sync n0:
Everyone praised Bernhardt's courage
and believed in his promise.

10164.<voice 05071_00010164><start_lip_sync n0:
But Bernhardt never returned, and
his promise never fulfilled...

10165.<voice 05158_00010165><start_lip_sync n0:
In response, everyone who had once
believed turned their backs on
Bernhardt, calling him a liar!

10166.<voice 05270_00010166><start_lip_sync n0:
The young master wants to get
back at all those people who mocked
his father.

10167.<voice 05314_00010167><start_lip_sync n0:
So to inherit the ability to use the Sacred Ship, he went to go see Yakuru in his settlement northeast of
the castle. He is one of the Four Sorcerers.

10168.<voice 05369_00010168><start_lip_sync n0:
But the young master has never been
in a real fight with a monster before....
Please help him! I'm begging you!

10170.<voice 00155_00010170><start_lip_sync n0:
Yakuru, who is one of the Four Sorcerers, lives in a settlement northeast of the castle. The young
master is most likely headed there.

10171.<voice 00205_00010171><start_lip_sync n0:
He is strong, but the truth is...
He's never fought a monster before.

10172.<voice 00235_00010172><start_lip_sync n0:
Please, help the young master.
I'm begging you!

10173.<voice 00170_00010173><start_lip_sync n0:
I am Erju, son of Ship Shaper
Bernhardt. As tradition, I've come
to receive the succession ceremony!

10174.<voice 00200_00010174><start_lip_sync n0:
Yakuru of the Four Sorcerers. My father has has told me about the succession of the art of the Sacred Ship.
Please begin the succession ceremony at once.

10175.<voice 00280_00010175><start_lip_sync n0:
You must be Bernhardt's... I see.
I'm glad you've come.

10176.<voice 00375_00010176><start_lip_sync n0:
But you should know how these things work. Isn't there something you should say first before spouting
off with demands?

10177.<voice 00675_00010177><start_lip_sync n0:
When Reidametes drove us from
our home, the humans took control
of our scarce source of water.

10178.<voice 00705_00010178><start_lip_sync n0:
After you humans drove us out of
Glen Castle, everyone here is now
starving and thirsty.

10179.<voice 00755_00010179><start_lip_sync n0:
I see... that's quite unfortunate.
However, that is none of my business.

10180.<voice 00785_00010180><start_lip_sync n0:
For now, it's best if you just fulfill your role as one of the sorcerers. Once I am Ship Shaper, you'll
have nothing to worry about.

10181.<voice 00920_00010181><start_lip_sync n0:
You don't understand anything,
do you?

10182.<voice 00950_00010182><start_lip_sync n0:
...very well. As one of the Four
Sorcerers, I am under oath to test your
worthiness of becoming the Ship Shaper.

10183.<voice 00990_00010183><start_lip_sync n0:
Your father would never ignore a
person in need. Show us that same
compassion.

10184.<voice 01030_00010184><start_lip_sync n0: What are you trying to say...?

10185.<voice 01070_00010185><start_lip_sync n0:
There is little water to go around here. If you can share even a little water from the castle, many lives
will be saved.

10187.<voice 01185_00010187><start_lip_sync n0:
I think it's you who doesn't know
how these things work...

10188.<voice 01300_00010188><start_lip_sync n0:
I didn't come here to be some errand
boy. I came here to take the
succession ceremony!

10189.<voice 01330_00010189><start_lip_sync n0:
If you want my end of the bargain,
you'll have to fulfill this duty first!

10190.<voice 01530_00010190><start_lip_sync n0:
...And you are?
An acquaintance of Erju?

10191.<voice 01630_00010191><start_lip_sync n0:
Why are you here...? I don't know
what you want with me, but please
stop following me everywhere.

10192.<voice 01910_00010192><start_lip_sync n0:
Good grief... that Erju kid is something
else. With his attitude, he won't be
taking the ceremony anytime soon.

10193.<voice 02027_00010193><start_lip_sync n0:
Hey, you. If you care about that kid
so much, why don't you help out
Yakuru instead?

10194.<voice 02057_00010194><start_lip_sync n0:
Getting water from Glen Castle
should be no problem for a
human such as yourself, right?

10195.<voice 00130_00010195><start_lip_sync n0:
You don't seem to understand
anything about your father.

10196.<voice 00170_00010196><start_lip_sync n0:
I've made no mistake.
I'm not leaving until I fulfill the
succession ceremony.

19001160.<voice 00000_19001160><start_lip_sync n0:
Thanks for bringing the water...
You're different from those people
at the castle...

19001161.<voice 00001_19001161><start_lip_sync n0:
Thanks for bringing the water...
You're different from those people
at the castle...

19001162.<voice 00002_19001162><start_lip_sync n0:
You know...
I want you to take me with you.

19001163.<voice 00003_19001163><start_lip_sync n0:
I had a strange dream about this...
That a human boy would come and
would need help.

19001164.<voice 00004_19001164><start_lip_sync n0:
I told my mom about it and she
said it probably meant Erju...

19001165.<voice 00005_19001165><start_lip_sync n0: But Erju won't even look at us...

19001166.<voice 00006_19001166><start_lip_sync n0:
Please. Please take me with you.
I think I can help if I follow you.

19001167.<voice 00007_19001167><start_lip_sync n0:
I would like to ask you to do the
same for me.

19001168.ヒメアが\nパーティに加わった。<se_nots System Guest_jo: Himea has joined the party.<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>

10198.<voice 00155_00010198><start_lip_sync n0:
You again?
Didn't I tell you to leave me alone?

10200.<voice 00330_00010200><start_lip_sync n0: I see... Instead of Erju, you...

10202.<voice 00455_00010202><start_lip_sync n0:
Thank you, kind human.
How many people here will be
saved by this water, I wonder?

10203.<voice 00540_00010203><start_lip_sync n0:
Erju, come this way.
We'll begin the succession ceremony.

10205.<voice 00630_00010205><start_lip_sync n0:
I'm not doing it for you. It's all
because of this person, who helped us
by acting on your behalf.

10206.<voice 00700_00010206><start_lip_sync n0:
I'm not sure why, but they seem
to really be hoping that you'll
inherit the Sacred Ship.

10208.<voice 01610_00010208><start_lip_sync n0:
You now have the basic skills
required to become a Ship Shaper.

10209.<voice 01705_00010209><start_lip_sync n0:
I feel a flow of power... this must
be the Ship Shaper's power...

10210.<voice 01776_00010210><start_lip_sync n0:
You must complete the other two ceremonies. If I were you, I'd first go visit the Pukulipo sorcerer staying
at Gert Strait to the south.

10211.<voice 01816_00010211><start_lip_sync n0:
You don't have to tell me.
Anyways, I'll be off.

10213.<voice 02066_00010213><start_lip_sync n0:
What? I'm not going to thank you.
We've already done each other's duty.

10214.<voice 02116_00010214><start_lip_sync n0:
I don't need your thanks.
But don't you think you should
thank the one who helped me?

10215.<voice 02321_00010215><start_lip_sync n0:
They did that on their own.
I'm not going to say thanks
for something I never asked for.

10216.<voice 02821_00010216><start_lip_sync n0:
Human, who is kind... if you
can, would you please continue to
keep an eye on Erju?

10217.<voice 02851_00010217><start_lip_sync n0:
With how things are now, he will
definitely have trouble again.

10219.<voice 00065_00010219><start_lip_sync n0:
To have guests coming here one
after the other...

10220.<voice 00125_00010220><start_lip_sync n0:
My apologies for rambling on.
My name is Fostail.
There's a reason I am here.

10221.<voice 00165_00010221><start_lip_sync n0:
What is your reason for being here? Is
there something you need from me?

10222.<voice 00235_00010222><start_lip_sync n0:
Erju...?
Ah, you mean that Ship Shaper boy...

10223.<voice 00300_00010223><start_lip_sync n0:
He came here a while ago and asked
me to perform the succession ceremony.

10224.<voice 00330_00010224><start_lip_sync n0:
I accepted his offer, of course but before I
will do the ceremony, I have asked him to
complete a task as my way to test him.

10225.<voice 00380_00010225><start_lip_sync n0:
I asked him to get me an Icebird
Feather, which is sometimes dropped
by a monster called Apeckalypse.

10226.<voice 00410_00010226><start_lip_sync n0: As soon as I told him, he took off.

10228.<voice 00495_00010228><start_lip_sync n0:
I offered to go with him as it's
quite dangerous, but he was insistent
on going by himself.

10229.<voice 00525_00010229><start_lip_sync n0:
He said he had to go alone this
time...

10230.<voice 00555_00010230><start_lip_sync n0:
I don't know what happened to him before he came here, but his stubbornness made me feel quite
uneasy, like that of a storm...

10231.<voice 00605_00010231><start_lip_sync n0:
You seem to be well-travelled.
Sorry to ask, but could you lend
Erju a hand?<yesno><close>

10232.<voice 00775_00010232><start_lip_sync n0:
You came here because you care
for Erju, right? In that case...

10233.<voice 00655_00010233><start_lip_sync n0:
Thank you for your help. If you
would, please head to Landonfoot,
located southwest of this strait.

10234.<voice 00685_00010234><start_lip_sync n0:
You and Erju will have to work together
to defeat the Apeckalypses that wander
the area and obtain an Icebird Feather.

22632.<voice 00080_00022632><start_lip_sync n0:
Huff... huff... Cursed Apeckalypse...
Just give me the damn feather already...!

10237.<voice 00580_00010237><start_lip_sync n0: You, again? What is it now?

10238.<voice 00660_00010238><start_lip_sync n0:
What? Fostail asked you to help
me find an Icebird Feather?

10239.<voice 00690_00010239><start_lip_sync n0:
Hmph. I don't need your help.
I can do this on my own.

10240.<voice 00765_00010240><start_lip_sync n0:
If you're so inclined, you can get an
Icebird Feather and bring it to him
yourself.

10241.<voice 00795_00010241><start_lip_sync n0:
But I'm sure I'll get it first and
beat you to it anyway.

10242.<pc>は フォステイルに\n氷鳥のはねを 渡した！:
<pc>
handed the Icebird Feather
to Fostail!

10243.<voice 00090_00010243><start_lip_sync n0:
Thank you for your help.
With this, the people of Palkuras
will surely be saved...

10244.<voice 00330_00010244><start_lip_sync n0:
Wasn't Erju with you?
He hasn't come back yet.

10245.<voice 00480_00010245><start_lip_sync n0:
Ah, Erju. Welcome back.
Did you bring an Icebird Feather, too?

10247.<voice 00610_00010247><start_lip_sync n0:
Oh, I see... you weren't able to
get your hands on one, then?

10248.<voice 00680_00010248><start_lip_sync n0:
You got what you needed, right? But don't I still need to do something for you in order to perform the
succession ceremony?

19001465.<voice 00780_19001465><start_lip_sync n0:
... Well, ok.
As thanks to <pc>
I will perform the ceremony.

19001466.<voice 00780_19001466><start_lip_sync n0:
... Well, ok.
As thanks to <pc>
I will perform the ceremony.

10250.<voice 01733_00010250><start_lip_sync n0:
There.
You now have the magical power
necessary to create the Sacred Ship.

10252.<voice 01854_00010252><start_lip_sync n0:
But you are not yet ready to control
the Sacred Ship. There is still one more
succession ceremony left to complete.

10253.<voice 01894_00010253><start_lip_sync n0:
I know that. But I can still create
a Sacred Ship, even now?

10254.<voice 01961_00010254><start_lip_sync n0:
Okay! Let's give a shot!
Fostail, follow me outside!

10256.<voice 02536_00010256><start_lip_sync n0:
Are you ready? Focus your mind, and imagine the ship that you want to create. Then,
unleash all of your magical power.

10259.<voice 03656_00010259><start_lip_sync n0:
Urgh..
I can't... hold it... it's too... much...

10260.<voice 04156_00010260><start_lip_sync n0:
You've done well for your first try.
I've no doubt that you are the son
of Bernhardt.

10261.<voice 04251_00010261><start_lip_sync n0:
You both must be quite exhausted from
today. Why not rest here for the night?

10263.<voice 05311_00010263><start_lip_sync n0:
You're quite strange, you know that?
You've followed me everywhere
even after I told you not to.

10264.<voice 05401_00010264><start_lip_sync n0:
My father was a sorcerer in service of Gran Zedora, one of the great powers of Lendersia. He had many
apprentices and was well respected.

10265.<voice 05446_00010265><start_lip_sync n0:
I'm proud to be a descendant of my father, an amazing Ship Shaper. I thought there was nothing I couldn't do.
And yet...

10267.<voice 05746_00010267><start_lip_sync n0:
<pc>, huh?
It's a strange name, but I guess
that suits you.

10268.<voice 05771_00010268><start_lip_sync n0:
Until now, I had never thought about the suffering of others. I never understood how my father felt when
he risked his life for the sake of others.

10269.<voice 05796_00010269><start_lip_sync n0:
But... now I sort of understand.
The way my father felt when he
wanted to help someone.

10272.<voice 06171_00010272><start_lip_sync n0:
I see... so the Landon Mountains
are also in its path...

10273.<voice 06426_00010273><start_lip_sync n0:
Look... It's almost touching
the summit. Reidametes is starting
to slowly descend.

10274.<voice 06717_00010274><start_lip_sync n0:
The barrier of light can't keep it
away any longer. Glen Castle doesn't
have much time left, either.

10275.<voice 07236_00010275><start_lip_sync n0:
There's no time to lose. We should
head back and prepare for tomorrow.

10276.<voice 07827_00010276><start_lip_sync n0:
Erju. The last sorcerer is a man named Gamilgo. He should be located in a settlement in the
northwest part of Landonfoot.

10277.<voice 07877_00010277><start_lip_sync n0:
However... as a human, Gamilgo will
not be so easily swayed by you.

10278.<voice 07947_00010278><start_lip_sync n0:
No need to worry.
I appreciate your help.

10280.<voice 08272_00010280><start_lip_sync n0:
D...did I say something funny or something? Even if I say no, you'll still follow me, won't you? We don't
have time to waste.

10281.<voice 08472_00010281><start_lip_sync n0:
Erju has many more hardships
awaiting him. Please be there to
support him.

19001171.<voice 00000_19001171><start_lip_sync n0:
Hang on. Sorry but only humans
are allowed here.

19001172.<voice 00001_19001172><start_lip_sync nh: Huh...! Well, that's that I guess!

19001173.<voice 00002_19001173><start_lip_sync n0:
It's not that other races can't enter, just
that it's more dangerous for them
during these times..

19001175.<voice 00004_19001175><start_lip_sync nh: What the... What the heck is this!?

19001178.<voice 00007_19001178><start_lip_sync n0:
Now you can see and hear what
Erju sees and hears. And of
course, I can as well.

19001179.<voice 00008_19001179><start_lip_sync nh:
Hmm... Thats truly amazing.
Elves are a brilliant race...

19001180.<voice 00009_19001180><start_lip_sync n0:
Well, okay.
Thats fine with me.
I have nothing to hide.

19001181.<voice 00010_19001181><start_lip_sync n0: We'll be waiting for you outside.

10282.<voice 00336_00010282><start_lip_sync n0:
Humans! What do you want!? Master
Gamilgo does not speak with your kind!

10283.<voice 00425_00010283><start_lip_sync n0:
Leave now, humans!
Or else I will draw my sword...

10285.<voice 00838_00010285><start_lip_sync n0:
You humans have some nerve
coming here, don't you?
What is your purpose here?

10286.<voice 01012_00010286><start_lip_sync n0:
So, you are Gamilgo. I am Erju,
son of Ship Shaper Bernhardt. I've
come to receive the succession ceremony.

10287.<voice 01098_00010287><start_lip_sync n0:
That's right. You must be Erju.
Bernhardt used to talk about you a lot.
He said he was proud of you.

10288.<voice 01148_00010288><start_lip_sync n0:
I see... so you'd like me to
perform the ceremony?

10291.<voice 01348_00010291><start_lip_sync n0:
Looks like Fostail was right.
They don't want anything to do
with humans, do they...

10292.<voice 01448_00010292><start_lip_sync n0:
But, Gamilgo, I have no time to waste
right now. If there's any requirement for
the succession, hurry up and tell me.

10293.<voice 01628_00010293><start_lip_sync n0:
Hey! You've got some nerve!
Show some respect!

10294.<voice 01778_00010294><start_lip_sync n0:
There is one thing. I want back
what's important to me.
But can you do it?

10295.<voice 01843_00010295><start_lip_sync n0:
The thing I want back... is my
homeland, Glen Castle.

10296.<voice 01928_00010296><start_lip_sync n0:
Glen Castle is your homeland?
What are you talking about?
That castle belongs to the humans.

10297.<voice 02001_00010297><start_lip_sync n0:
You damn human!
How dare you!

19001184.<voice 02002_19001184><start_lip_sync nh:
Glen castle belongs to the ogres!
You humans are all liars!

19001188.<voice 02006_19001188><start_lip_sync nh:
I won't let these... These...

19001189.<voice 02007_19001189><start_lip_sync nh:

with these fouls humans?!

19001190.<voice 02008_19001190><start_lip_sync n0: ...Garumi. Let us speak together for a moment.

19001191.<voice 02009_19001191><start_lip_sync nh: What trifles should we speak of?

19001192.<voice 02010_19001192><start_lip_sync n0:
Please, we must focus on the
topic at hand.

19001193.<voice 02206_19001193><start_lip_sync n0:
You don't know but these
humans mean you no harm. You are
hiding from the truth.

10299.<voice 02271_00010299><start_lip_sync n0:
Fine, half-Ship Shaper. I'll tell you
why we can't trust humans.

10300.<voice 02421_00010300><start_lip_sync n0:
Glen Castle originally belonged to the Ogres. When most of the world was burned to the ground, we opened
it to other races as well.

10301.<voice 02481_00010301><start_lip_sync n0:
With everyone's help, we managed
to get by. But, it didn't take long for
humans to show their true nature.

10302.<voice 02541_00010302><start_lip_sync n0:
The humans, unhappy with the distribution of water, suddenly took over Glen Castle. They drove all of
the other races out.

10303.<voice 02711_00010303><start_lip_sync n0: That's ridiculous. No way that's true!

10304.<voice 02811_00010304><start_lip_sync n0:
They drive us to this remote place and then ask us to cooperate when they are in trouble. Don't you
think that's unfair?

10306.<voice 03061_00010306><start_lip_sync n0:
I won't let you humans have your way
any longer, and we will take back what's
rightfully ours. Now, get out of my sight!

10308.<voice 03256_00010308><start_lip_sync n0:
Now is not the time to fight! I'll
convince Theodore to return the
castle to the Ogres!

Heh.
You make it sound so easy, boy.

10310.<voice 03531_00010310><start_lip_sync n0: I'm serious. There isn't much time.

10311.<voice 03591_00010311><start_lip_sync n0:
Interesting... then I'll take you up
on that offer. Let's see what you can
do, little man.

10312.<voice 03676_00010312><start_lip_sync n0:
If you return Glen Castle to us, I'll stop the fighting. And I'll make sure the succession ceremony is done
right.

19001194.<voice 03837_19001194><start_lip_sync nh:
Wait! You can't do that! I don't have
to just go along with all of this!

19001195.<voice 03838_19001195><start_lip_sync n0:
What are you talking about?!
Be silent!

19001199.<voice 03842_19001199><start_lip_sync n0: What they are saying is a good point...

19001201.<voice 03844_19001201><start_lip_sync n0:
Okay then, you will accompany
them and watch for any suspicious
activity.

19001202.<voice 03845_19001202><start_lip_sync nh: B-but... Ah-Yes, yes of course. I will.

19001203.<voice 03846_19001203><start_lip_sync n0: You're the one who brought it up!

19001206.<voice 03849_19001206><start_lip_sync n0: Good then, let's be done with it.

10315.<voice 00230_00010315><start_lip_sync n0:
Thank you so much! So you did accompany the young master after all, right?

10316.<voice 00270_00010316><start_lip_sync n0:

10318.<voice 00340_00010318><start_lip_sync n0:

10319.<voice 00395_00010319><start_lip_sync n0:

10321.<voice 00570_00010321><start_lip_sync n0:

to sell oil here. I'm going to see

it seems that Bocchan has

10325.<voice 00405_00010325><start_lip_sync n0: Please take care of Bocchan for me.

10327.<voice 00317_00010327><start_lip_sync n0:

10328.<voice 00366_00010328><start_lip_sync n0:

10329.<voice 00476_00010329><start_lip_sync n0:

10336.<voice 01049_00010336><start_lip_sync n0:

10338.<voice 01155_00010338><start_lip_sync n0:

 Thanks... for everything.

10380.<voice 00861_00010380><start_lip_sync n0:

10381.<voice 01040_00010381><start_lip_sync n0:

10383.<voice 01250_00010383><start_lip_sync n0:

10384.<voice 01310_00010384><start_lip_sync n0:

for the sake of everyone who's suffering...

19001244.<voice 01313_19001244><start_lip_sync nh:
Human.

19001245.<voice 01314_19001245><start_lip_sync n0:

19001247.<voice 01316_19001247><start_lip_sync nh: I want to see this through to the end.

19001248.<voice 01317_19001248><start_lip_sync n0:

19001249.<voice 01318_19001249><start_lip_sync n0:

19001250.<voice 01319_19001250><start_lip_sync n0:

19001252.<voice 01321_19001252><start_lip_sync n0:

19001253.<voice 01322_19001253><start_lip_sync n0:

19001256.<voice 01325_19001256><start_lip_sync n0:

19001258.<voice 03120_19001258><start_lip_sync n0:

19001261.<voice 00140_19001261><start_lip_sync n0:
I'll summon the ship now, go and
destroy Reidametes!!

10397.<voice 00539_00010397><start_lip_sync m5:
My name is Razburn. I am the
guardian of this temple.

10398.<voice 00640_00010398><start_lip_sync m5:

10399.<voice 00701_00010399><start_lip_sync m5:

10400.<voice 00810_00010400><start_lip_sync m5:

10401.<voice 00939_00010401><start_lip_sync m5:

19001262.<voice 00940_19001262><start_lip_sync nh:

19001263.<voice 00941_19001263><start_lip_sync n0:

10402.<voice 01400_00010402><start_lip_sync m5:

Hmm hmm hmm...

10405.<voice 00600_00010405><start_lip_sync m5:

10409.<voice 01441_00010409><start_lip_sync m5:

19001267.<voice 02671_19001267><start_lip_sync n0:

10416.<voice 00555_00010416>「<cs_pchero>。いつかは疑:

10420.<voice 02401_00010420><start_lip_sync n0:

10421.<voice 02530_00010421><start_lip_sync n0: Kai... Yeah, I'm all right now.

10424.<voice 02871_00010424><start_lip_sync n0:
<cs_pchero>.

19001272.<voice 02990_19001272><start_lip_sync n0:

10426.<voice 03071_00010426><start_lip_sync n0:

10430.<voice 03785_00010430><start_lip_sync n0:

10433.<voice 04294_00010433><start_lip_sync n0:

Garumi! You look a little more grown

19001277.<voice 04298_19001277><start_lip_sync n0:

10451.<voice 00800_00010451><start_lip_sync n0:

10452.<voice 00850_00010452><start_lip_sync n0:

19001292.<voice 00911_19001292><start_lip_sync n0:

10457.<voice 02153_00010457><start_lip_sync n0:
